channel.title: Internals on Awaiting Bits
channel.description: Recent content in Internals on Awaiting Bits

item.title: Blazor Internals: EventCallback
item.description: Figuring out how technologies are maid under the hood is one of the things I love to do. Ever since I started using Blazor and going in-depth into its features, I can’t stop wondering how things are made internally. This post is the start of a series about, you guess it, Blazor Internals.
